pluginstrument.author: Jack Zero
pluginstrument.description: Full cockpit controls (glareshield, pedestal, fmc) for Ddenn's Challenger 300, meant to be used on a Full HD touchscreen with a instance of X-Plane showing the displays running in the background. Note that the FMC popup will require X-FMC in order to work. It will only work with at least the 10.31 version of the Challenger since the names of all custom dataref where changed in the update.
